singulars.dontHaveAnAccountPrompt: Don't have an account? Sign up
singulars.alreadyHaveAnAccountPrompt: Already have an account? Log in
singulars.signUpLinkLabel: Don't have an account? Sign up
singulars.missingConfirmation: This email address has not yet been verified. Make sure to check your inbox and spam folders, or request a new verification email by clicking <0>here</0>.
singulars.verificationComplete: Email address successfully verified! Click <0>here</0> to return to the home page.
singulars.verificationFailure: Something went wrong with the email verification process. To fix the issue, you can try the following steps:

verificationFix.1: If you copied the link from the email, make sure it was pasted in its entirety.
verificationFix.2: Request a new verification email using the form below.

signup.special: Sign up for WalkScape account with special beta access
